name: Blue Hippo MkIII
details:
Way Huge Smalls Blue Hippo Analog Chorus MkIII WM61The Blue Hippo Analog Chorus sounds as lusciously liquefied as ever in a Way Huge Smalls housing. With its simple Speed and Depth control interface, you can dial in everything from lush tone-widening to full-on rotating speaker modulation madness. If you want to splash on some thick vibrato goodness, just flip the Vibe switch to give your already aqueous tones a little more texture. The Blue Hippo Analog Chorus is straightforward and no-nonsense—just plug in and dive into the deep end.
https://www.jimdunlop.com/way-huge-smalls-blue-hippo-analog-chorus/
